p: Results of serial (typically daily) measurements of clinical and laboratory parameters in patients with HFRS caused by DOBV/PUUV are shown in Tables 2 and 3, and outlined in Fig 1 and S1 Fig. Detailed information on their dynamics is given in S2 and S3 Figs. In the majority of patients the classic clinical distinction into febrile, hypotonic, oliguric, polyuric, and convalescent phases of illness was not evident.
